content.p: This section provides links to all policies which form part of the Quality Manual. These pages are applicable to staff and students across all of the UK, China and Malaysia campuses unless stated otherwise. High Performance Athlete academic flexibility Policy for the collection and use of Student Evaluation of Teaching and Student Evaluation of Module surveys Policy on academic appeals Policy on academic misconduct Policy on alternative English language qualifications *** Amended for Covid-19 *** Policy on applicant complaints Policy on circumstances affecting students' ability to study and complete assessments Policy on conflict of interest Policy on e-exams Policy on e-learning and distance learning Policy on Feedback to students Policy on inappropriate applicant behaviour Policy on Joint Honours programmes Policy on long-term conditions or disabilities affecting students ability to study and complete assessment Policy on marking and grading Policy on minimum English language entry requirements *** Amended for Covid-19 *** Policy on occasional teachers Policy on penalties for late submission of assessed work Policy on PGR maternity / paternity / adoption leave Policy on PGR sick leave Policy on proofreading Policy on student complaints Policy on students who teach Policy on the legibility of work submitted for assessment Policy on the retention of assessed work Policy to instigate an investigation by an independent person following a complaint to the Students' Union Safeguarding The thesis pending period (including Policy on extension) Student Services Academic-Service-Office@nottingham.edu.cn student_registry@nottingham.edu.my Quality-Manual-Enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Portland Building, University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
